about.title: About me
about.about: I am focused on front-end development using React and I am open to learning other tools. Additionally, I am studying back-end development to become a full stack developer. Initially, I started my studies in Psychology for two years, but my interest programming led me to dedicate myself exclusively to it. I learned programming by watching videos on YouTube and using other platforms, which allowed me to acquire enough knowledge to create a database, connect it to the backend and make requests from the Mi front-end. The goal is to delve deeper into back-end development to better understand data management and the underlying concepts.

projects.title: Individual Projects
projects.description1: Rick and Morty series application where you can see a list of the characters and a form for you to create yours!
projects.description2: Application to create task lists so you can see them in real time, you can edit and delete as you like!
projects.description3: Project so you can see the price of the dollar quote updating in real time!
